page.description: Returns a user GUID from a userid.
page.syntax: GUID as C = a5ws_Get_GUID_From_User(C userid [,* Localrequest ])

argument.name: GUID
argument.description: The unique ID assigned to a user in the web security system

argument.name: userid
argument.description: The userid value of a person in the user table in the web security system.

argument.name: Localrequest
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. It is added automatically by the server when run from a web page.

page.discussion: The A5WS_Get_GUID_From_User() returns the unique ID assigned to a user ID in the user table. Returns the unique ID assigned to a user ID.

see.ref: Returns the unique ID assigned to a user ID
